resources.string: Riddle Room
Deep Gulhane
In Anjaana Anjaani, Akash and Kiara meet because they wanted to die by suicide by jumping off the George Washington Bridge.
In Band Baaja Baaraat, Bittoo and Shruti start their own wedding planning company called ‘Shaadi Zindabad’.
In Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara, Kabir suggests skydiving as his choice of adventure sports.
Ranbir Kapoor’s character name in Rockstar was Janardhan Jakhar.
In English Vinglish, Shashi travelled to the city of Los Angeles for her niece’s wedding.
In Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, Aditi was initially in love with Avinash.
In Dil Dhadakne Do, the Mehras have a multi-million dollar business called ‘AyKe’.
In Kapoor and Sons, the story is based in Coonoor.
Before making it big, Akshay Kumar worked as a waiter.
Kangana Ranaut has more Instagram followers than superstar Amitabh Bachchan.
One infected person infects about 2.5 other people.
Patients with COVID-19 can take anti-inflammatory medicine like ibuprofen, aspirin or naproxen.
Once infected with the coronavirus, it can take 2 to 14 days to show symptoms.
Hand sanitizer doesn’t kill coronavirus because it’s antibacterial, not antiviral.
Healthy people should practice social distancing.
During a shelter-in-place order, my kids can be with other kids in small groups.
Anyone with COVID-19 symptoms, regardless of their overall health, should seek testing.
A loss of smell or taste is a symptom of COVID-19.
If you can hold your breath for 10 seconds, you don’t have COVID-19.
COVID-19 can spread through mosquitoes.
A monitor displays information...
A SD card is an output device...
A microphone is used an input device...
A pen drive is a storage device...
Microsoft office is a piece of software...
A firewall is a type of hardware...
The CPU is referred as the stomach of the computer...
A terabyte is equal to 1 million gigabytes...
CD stands for collective disk...
Bluetooth allows your device to connect with another device...
True
False
Score 0/10
